span.style: color: rgb(63, 63, 63);

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: georgia, serif; font-size: small; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: TIGERS: We miss you and care about you! Over the past couple of weeks, teachers have attempted to contact all of our Tigers by phone, email or regular mail. If you have not heard from your student’s teacher it may be because we do not have updated contact information. Please contact your student’s building and let us know how to reach you or your student. See numbers below.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: georgia, serif; font-size: small; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Our priority will always be education and caring for our students. Each Monday by noon all teachers will be providing optional educational activities or resources for students. These are optional activities, however, are a great way for you or your student to stay actively involved in continued education during the school closure! Activities & resources will look different in each building and for each Tiger. Our mission is to continue to provide learning options for all grade levels. Please use the following Learning Activities Dashboard for a list of where to find these activities at each building. Thank you for your continued support!

p.span: Students should check their gmail account and Google Classrooms at least once per week. Teachers will be posting a lesson and a learning challenge/enrichment activity each week in Google Classroom. Although these activities are NOT for a grade, students are encouraged to participate to stay active with the content.

span.style: font-family: Tahoma;

Although these activities are NOT for a grade, students are encouraged to participate to stay active with the content.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Regular LHS classes and one-hour LCTC classes will be credit/no credit (pass/fail) this semester. This will not affect GPA. Students who are not passing have the opportunity to do remediation with their teacher to improve their grade. Dual Credit classes will follow guidelines set by MSSU.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 11pt;

span.span: 3-hour LCTC students will receive the grade they had at the end of 3rd Quarter, March 6. However, students can work with their instructor to improve that grade, if desired. Certification tests will still be offered at a later date.

span.style: font-size: 16px;
font-size: 11pt;
span.br:
Even though we can't be together at a formal banquet, we still want to celebrate your accomplishments. Feel free to enjoy the slideshow below, featuring fromer graduate of the Class of 1998, Jason Owen, as guest speaker. And remember, we are super proud of you!
Academic All Stars Presentation

div.style: overflow-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Fix for Mac Chrome 80", system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; color: rgb(5, 5, 5); font-size: 15px;
div.div: Starting Monday, April 20th the Grab & Go meal program will have a Monday & Wednesday pickup only. Monday will include breakfast and lunch for Monday & Tuesday. Wednesday pickup will include breakfast & lunch for Wednesday, Thursday & Friday.

div.class: o9v6fnle cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql ii04i59q

div.div: Please stay in your car when picking up.
